SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller

Interface ServerControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionController, GameController, LobbyController, ServerController
public interface ServerControllerInterface extends ControllerInterface
The ServerControllerInterface extends ControllerInterface to define methods specific to server-side operations in response to requests from clients or triggered by the fulfillment of certain conditions.

Methods defined in this interface include:

  • createPlayer(NetworkSession, String) - Registers a new instance of player, linking it with their NetworkSession and the requested nickname.
  • setNickname(NetworkSession, String) - Updates the player's nickname.
  • keepAlive(NetworkSession) - Keeps the session alive to prevent disconnection.
  • createLobby(NetworkSession, int) - Creates a new lobby with a specified maximum number of players.
  • joinLobby(NetworkSession, UUID) - Allows a player to join a specified lobby.
  • pickColor(NetworkSession, Color) - Allows a player to pick a color before starting a game.
  • leaveLobby(NetworkSession, boolean) - Handles a player leaving a lobby, distinguishing if it is due to a disconnection or voluntary.
  • pickObjective(NetworkSession, int) - Allows a player to pick one of the objective cards by its ID from the previously given choice.
  • placeCard(NetworkSession, GenericPair, int, Side) - Places a card on the game board at specified coordinates.
  • drawFromDeck(NetworkSession, String) - Allows a player to draw a card from a specified deck.
  • drawFromVisibleCards(NetworkSession, String, int) - Allows a player to draw a card from the visible ones at a specified position.
  • leaveGame(NetworkSession) - Handles a player leaving the game, also managing their disconnection from the server.
  • directMessage(NetworkSession, String, String) - Sends a direct message to another player.
  • broadcastMessage(NetworkSession, String) - Broadcasts a message to all players.

  • Method Details

    • createPlayer

      void createPlayer(NetworkSession sender, String nickname)
      Registers a new instance of player, linking it with their NetworkSession and the requested nickname.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      nickname - The nickname to be assigned to the new player.

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(NetworkSession sender, String nickname)
      Updates the player's nickname.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      nickname - The new nickname to be set.

    • keepAlive

      void keepAlive(NetworkSession sender)
      Keeps the session alive to prevent disconnection.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.

    • createLobby

      void createLobby(NetworkSession sender, int maxPlayers)
      Creates a new lobby with the specified maximum number of players.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      maxPlayers - The maximum number of players allowed in the lobby.

    • joinLobby

      void joinLobby(NetworkSession sender, UUID lobbyUUID)
      Allows a player to join a specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      lobbyUUID - The unique identifier of the lobby to join.

    • pickColor

      void pickColor(NetworkSession sender, Color color)
      Allows a player to pick a color before starting a game.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      color - The color chosen by the player.

    • leaveLobby

      void leaveLobby(NetworkSession sender, boolean isInactive)
      Handles a player leaving a lobby, distinguishing if it is due to a disconnection or voluntary.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      isInactive - Whether the player is to be marked as inactive.

    • pickObjective

      void pickObjective(NetworkSession sender, int cardID)
      Allows a player to pick one of the objective cards by its ID from the previously given choice.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      cardID - The ID of the objective card to pick.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(NetworkSession sender, GenericPair<Integer,Integer> coordinates, int cardID, Side playedSide)
      Places a card on the game board at specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      coordinates - The coordinates where the card is to be placed.
      cardID - The ID of the card being placed.
      playedSide - The side of the card being played.

    • drawFromDeck

      void drawFromDeck(NetworkSession sender, String deck)
      Allows a player to draw a card from a specified deck.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      deck - The name of the deck from which to draw a card.

    • drawFromVisibleCards

      void drawFromVisibleCards(NetworkSession sender, String deck, int position)
      Allows a player to draw a card from the visible ones at a specified position.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      deck - The name of the deck from which to draw a card.
      position - The position of the card to draw from the visible cards.

    • leaveGame

      void leaveGame(NetworkSession sender)
      Handles a player leaving the game, also managing their disconnection from the server.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.

    • directMessage

      void directMessage(NetworkSession sender, String receiverNickname, String message)
      Sends a direct message to another player.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      receiverNickname - The nickname of the player who receives the message.
      message - The message to be sent.

    • broadcastMessage

      void broadcastMessage(NetworkSession sender, String message)
      Broadcasts a message to all players.
      Parameters:
      sender - The network session of the player making the request.
      message - The message to be broadcast.
